name: vss-developer-tools
description: Visual Studio Online Extension Developer Tools Extension

scripts.content:all: npm run content:web && npm run content:tasks && npm run content:extension
scripts.prelink:tasks: mkdirp dist/_temp && pushd "dist/_temp" && npm init -f && npm install vsts-task-lib && popd
scripts.link:tasks: copyfiles -u 2 dist/_temp/node_modules/**/* dist/BuildTasks/PackageExtension && copyfiles -u 2 dist/_temp/node_modules/**/* dist/BuildTasks/PublishExtension
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run compile:web && npm run content:all && npm run link:tasks
scripts.pkgvstsext: tfx extension create --root dist --output-path dist --manifest-globs vss-extension*.json

author: Microsoft Corporation
